>Version: 1.2 Date: 22/02/2012
-Loaded files now have readline(), readlines() implementations allowing text files (scripts etc.) to be archived, loaded and read with ease.
-Loaded files can now be iterated over for each line in the file.
-Demo has been modified to show text file operations.

>Version: 1.1 Date: 24/02/2012
-Fully Documentation.

>Version: 1.0 Date: 22/02/2012
-Debut Release.
